scripts.docker-dev: docker exec -it holoron-web sh -c "npm run dev"
scripts.docker-start: npm run docker-up && npm run docker-dev
scripts.docker-first: npm run docker-build && npm run docker-install && npm run docker-dev
scripts.docker-stop: docker-compose kill frontend || true && docker-compose rm frontend --force || true
scripts.docker-restart: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-start
scripts.docker-clear: npm run docker-stop && docker-compose down frontend -v --remove-orphans || true
